filter_out_none¶

tessilator.lc_analysis.filter_out_none(unfiltered)[source]¶

Simple function to remove list items if they are empty.

Parameters:
unfilteredIterable

The input set of values

Returns:
filteredlist

The filtered list.

>>> filter_out_none([1, 4, None, 6, 9])
    ..
[1, 4, 6, 9]
